name: Dropdown
description: A UI element that represents a dropdown selection field.

instanceFields.label: Label
instanceFields.description: The label text displayed next to the Dropdown.

instanceFields.label: Index
instanceFields.description: The index of the currently selected option (0-based).

instanceFields.label: Choices
instanceFields.description: Gets the list of available choices.

instanceMethods.label: OnValueChanged
instanceMethods.description: Sets the method to be called when the Dropdown value changes.

parameters.name: valueChangedEvent
parameters.description: Method that will be called with the new selected value as parameter

instanceMethods.label: SetValueWithoutNotify
instanceMethods.description: Sets the value of the Dropdown without triggering any change events.

instanceMethods.label: SetIndexWithoutNotify
instanceMethods.description: Sets the index of the selected option without triggering any change events.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the option to select (0-based).

instanceMethods.label: AddChoice
instanceMethods.description: Adds a choice to the dropdown options.

instanceMethods.label: RemoveChoice
instanceMethods.description: Removes a choice from the dropdown options.

instanceMethods.label: ClearChoices
instanceMethods.description: Clears all choices from the dropdown.
